Html:
Hello,

I have installed the latest release of WPP and version 3.2.7600.226 of WSUS on a Windows Server 2008R2 machine. I have followed the installation guide on this website, but I'm still getting the invalid certificate error. However I can view the certificate in the Trusted Root Certification Authorities, Trusted Publishers and WSUS certificates.

When enabling the option "Ignored Code-Signing Certificate validation errors" and publishing an Adobe Reader Upgrade file, I get the error "Verification of file signature failed for file: \SRV-OP-JP02\UpdateServicesPackages....cab".

I have already restarted the server several times and the KB2661254 is not installed on the server.

Any idea?

Thanks in advance.

Pls check first the Build from your WSUS. In WSUS-FAQ No. 44 you will find more Informations about the place you will find the Build and which Build you have to have:
http://wsus.de/faq
After you have installed Build .274, pls restart WSUS and try again.

However I can view the certificate in the Trusted Root Certification Authorities, Trusted Publishers and WSUS certificates.
Ensure that certificate is a code signing certificate and is in COMPUTER store, not USER store.

After following the Signed Certification manual (with CA) it works fine. I'm getting an error on the WSUS client, but has nothing to do with WPP.
I'll test further. Thanks a lot for the quick responses and the clear documentation!
